title: Bought - The Pain of Surre
description: Life with Ethan Chase is far from idyllic. The harsh Dom is as selfish in the bedroom as he is in every other aspect of his world. Then Matilda meets Lily. Lily shows Matilda how wonderful lovemaking can really be. However Ethan is never far away and there is always a price to pay for any pleasure she enjoys. Lily is a revelation, mysterious, beautiful and gives her attentions freely. But Lily has a man in her life – the hunky Bryce Somerton, another Dom and Ethan’s friend. One party, one night, by the end of which, Matilda will never be the same again.
author: Lacey King
